snippet: Jerry Stackhouse, the first major professional athlete in Brooklyn to wear No. 42 since Jackie Robinson, joined the Nets in honoring his idol.
abstract: Brooklyn Nets guard Jerry Stackhouse, first major professional athlete in Brooklyn to wear No. 42 since Jackie Robinson, joins his team in honoring his idol as the Nets install Ebbets Field flagpole outside their new arena.
lead_paragraph: Jerry Stackhouse, the first major professional athlete in Brooklyn to wear No. 42 since Jackie Robinson, joined the Nets in honoring his idol.

headline.seo: Jerry Stackhouse Joins in Honoring Jackie Robinson and Brooklyn
headline.main: In Brooklyn, Taking Pride in No. 42
headline.print_headline: In Brooklyn, Taking Pride In No. 42
